categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Seigford Grey was a male Human Jedi Master residing on Tatooine around 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Seigford Grey appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Tatooine. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
